email_sender.label: Email From
email_sender.info: Emails sent by gitlab will come from this email address

email_sender_alias.label: Email From Alias
email_sender_alias.info: Messages sent to the Email From address will be delivered to this account or group

default_project.visibility_level.label: Visibility Level
default_project.visibility_level.info: How visible should your gitlab application be to the world?

default_project.visibility_level.choice..label: Private
default_project.visibility_level.choice..info: Gitlab will be in private mode

default_project.visibility_level.choice..label: Public
default_project.visibility_level.choice..info: Gitlab will be in public mode

default_project.visibility_level.choice..label: Internal
default_project.visibility_level.choice..info: Gitlab will be in internal mode
